snippet: Two senators asked for an independent investigation into allegations that Air Force Academy officials punished an investigator and the cadet informant who helped him look into drug use and sexual assault among football players.
abstract: Sens Kirsten E Gillibrand and John Thune call for investigation into claims that Air Force Academy officials retaliated against Sgt Brandon Enos and cadet informant Eric Thomas for investigating drug use and sexual assault among academy's football players.
lead_paragraph: Two senators asked for an independent investigation into allegations that Air Force Academy officials punished an investigator and the cadet informant who helped him look into drug use and sexual assault among football players.

headline.main: Inquiry Urged on Air Force Academy’s Handling of Sexual Assault Cases
headline.print_headline: Inquiry Urged on Air Force Academy’s Handling of Cases
